practice_phrases: That person over there.
那边那个人。
I asked that person over there.
我问那边那个人。
That person over there is right.
那边那个人对。
I agreed with that person over there a moment ago.
我刚才同意那边那个人。
Did you ask that person over there about the garden?
你问那边那个人关于花园了吗？
That person over there wanted to travel to Africa last year.
那边那个人去年想去非洲旅行。
I didn't agree with that person over there who works with you.
我不同意那边和你一起工作的那个人。
Yes, I asked that person over there if he wanted to work with you.
是的，我问那边那个人是否想和你一起工作。
That person over there said he couldn't agree with what you said a moment ago.
那边那个人说他不能同意你刚才说的话。
I asked if that person over there wanted to put it in the garden.
我问那边那个人是否想把它放在花园里。
